description:
We've got so much news to get to, but of courseÂ it starts with Tom Brady! After hisÂ finish as QB2 in 2021, can we justify ranking him outsideÂ the Top 5? Dave, Jamey and Chris discuss Brady and then we compare Amari Cooper's value (8:40) to Michael Gallup's value (12:50) and debate who will be the better bargain on draft day. And of course Zach Ertz is back with Arizona (20:40)!Â
